players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie’s death is rough. We need solid reads fast. Alice, who would you have targeted last night and why? Bob, share any gut reads and let’s cross-check behavior."

You: "Charlie dying N1 suggests mafia avoided PR risk. Bob, where’s your head? Diana, quick question: why ask who I’d target—fishing for PR thoughts or just pressure? My gut leans mild town on Diana, null on Bob."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Vote Diana today."
Bob: "Diana is confirmed mafia from my investigation. Alice, please vote Diana now to end this. Diana, if you claim otherwise, full claim now—with your night target and reasoning."

Diana: "Dramatic, Bob. If you’re real, why double-post and tunnel instead of getting Alice’s independent read first? Alice, check incentives: a fakeclaim forces a misyeet today; a real claim risks getting NK’d tonight. Which world makes more sense?"

You: "Bob, full claim with specifics: your role, exact N1 target/results, and reason you picked Diana. Diana, counterclaim/alt-PR? Also, both of you: where would you vote if we no-vote today? I’ll decide after clarity."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
